codeSystems.title: ValueSet Histologic Grade SNOMED
codeSystems.description: The ValueSet contains codes for the tumor grading system following the recommendations of the WHO Classification of Tumors from SNOMED CT.

codeSystems.description: The ValueSet contains the morphology (histology) codes from ICD-O-3.

codeSystems.description: The ValueSet contains the morphology (histology) codes from SNOMED CT.

codeSystems.name: VS_TNM_Classification_Type_LOINC
codeSystems.title: ValueSet TNM Classification Type LOINC
codeSystems.description: This ValueSet contains codes to specifiy the type of TNM classification as clinical (cTNM) or pathological (pTNM).

codeSystems.name: VS_TNM_L_Lymphatic_Invasion_UICC
codeSystems.title: ValueSet TNM L-Descriptor Lymphatic Invasion UICC
codeSystems.description: This ValueSet contains the TNM degree of lymphatic invasion codes used with the L-descriptor from TNM 8th edition UICC.

codeSystems.name: VS_TNM_M_Category_UICC
codeSystems.title: ValueSet TNM M Category UICC
codeSystems.description: This ValueSet contains the TNM M category codes from TNM 8th edition UICC.

codeSystems.name: VS_TNM_M_Staging_Type_LOINC
codeSystems.title: ValueSet TNM M Staging Type LOINC
codeSystems.description: This ValueSet contains codes to specifiy the TNM distant metastases (M) category as clinical (cM) or pathological (pM).

codeSystems.name: VS_TNM_N_Category_UICC
codeSystems.title: ValueSet TNM N Category UICC
codeSystems.description: This ValueSet contains the TNM N category codes from TNM 8th edition UICC.

codeSystems.name: VS_TNM_N_Staging_Type_LOINC
codeSystems.title: ValueSet TNM N Staging Type LOINC
codeSystems.description: This ValueSet contains codes to specifiy the TNM regional lymph nodes (N) category as clinical (cN) or pathological (pN).

codeSystems.name: VS_TNM_Pn_Perineural_Invasion_UICC
codeSystems.title: ValueSet TNM Pn-Descriptor Perineural Invasion UICC
codeSystems.description: This ValueSet contains the TNM degree of perineural (lymphatic nerve sheet) invasion codes used with the Pn-descriptor from TNM 8th edition UICC.

codeSystems.name: VS_TNM_Prefix_CPU_UICC
codeSystems.title: ValueSet TNM Prefix CPU UICC
codeSystems.description: This ValueSet contains the c, p and u prefixes for TNM stages from TNM 8th edition UICC.

codeSystems.name: VS_TNM_R_Classification_UICC
codeSystems.title: ValueSet TNM Residual Tumor (R) Classification UICC
codeSystems.description: This ValueSet contains the TNM residual tumor (R) classification codes from TNM 8th edition UICC.

codeSystems.name: VS_TNM_S_Serum_Tumor_Markers_UICC
codeSystems.title: ValueSet TNM S Serum Tumour Markers UICC
codeSystems.description: This ValueSet contains the TNM serum levels of tumor markers coded for germ cell tumors used with the S-symbol from TNM 8th edition UICC.

codeSystems.name: VS_TNM_Stage_Group_UICC
codeSystems.title: ValueSet TNM Stage Group UICC
codeSystems.description: The ValueSet contains codes for the TNM stage groups ranging from I to IV to group cancer patients with similar prognosis from TNM 8th edition UICC.

codeSystems.name: VS_TNM_Suffix_ITC_SN_UICC
codeSystems.title: ValueSet TNM Suffix ITC SN UICC
codeSystems.description: This ValueSet contains the isolated tumor cells (ITC) sentinel lymph nodes (sn) suffix for the N-category in TNM from TNM 8th edition UICC.

codeSystems.name: VS_TNM_Suffix_ITC_UICC
codeSystems.title: ValueSet TNM Suffix ITC UICC
codeSystems.description: This ValueSet contains the isolated tumor cells (ITC) suffixes for N- and M-category from TNM 8th edition UICC.

codeSystems.name: VS_TNM_T_Category_UICC
codeSystems.title: ValueSet TNM T Category UICC
codeSystems.description: This ValueSet contains the TNM T category codes from TNM 8th edition UICC.

codeSystems.name: VS_TNM_T_Multiplicity_UICC
codeSystems.title: ValueSet TNM T Multiplicity UICC
codeSystems.description: This ValueSet contains the TNM primary tumor multiplicity codes used with the m-symbol from TNM 8th edition UICC.

codeSystems.name: VS_TNM_T_Staging_Type_LOINC
codeSystems.title: ValueSet TNM T Staging Type LOINC
codeSystems.description: This ValueSet contains codes to specifiy the TNM primary tumor (T) category as clinical (cT) or pathological (pT).

codeSystems.name: VS_TNM_V_Venous_Invasion_UICC
codeSystems.title: ValueSet TNM V-Descriptor Venous Invasion UICC
codeSystems.description: This ValueSet contains the TNM degree of venous invasion codes used with the V-descriptor from TNM 8th edition UICC.

codeSystems.description: The ValueSet contains the topography codes from ICD-O-3.

codeSystems.description: The ValueSet contains the topography codes from SNOMED CT.
